nodes.text: The Sisters of Sarrav were a group to whom Karyn I'Yin belonged. I'Yin was quoted talking about all things being bound to the Force in Collected Poems, Prayers, and Meditations on the Force, a compilation of material relating to the Force edited by the Disciple of the Whills Kozem Pel.
The Sisters of Sarrav were first mentioned in the novel Guardians of the Whills, which was written by Greg Rucka and released on May 2, 2017.
